Literature.Title: Beta-defensin derived cationic antimicrobial peptides with potent killing activity against gram negative and gram positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Yang M, Zhang C, Zhang MZ, Zhang S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:3.6% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:10.1% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:17.5% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml,Murine dendritic cells JAWS II:20% Killing=64 µg/ml,Murine dendritic cells JAWS II:77% Killing=512 µg/ml,Chinese hamster ovary cells CHO-K1:<5% Killing=64 µg/ml,Chinese hamster ovary cells CHO-K1:77% Killing=512 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MIC=32-64µg/ml)
